codeSystems.name: AdmissionSourceValueSet
codeSystems.title: Admission Sources ValueSet
codeSystems.description: Defines the modes of transport or pathways by which the patient arrived.

codeSystems.name: AfibFlutterStatusVS
codeSystems.title: Atrial Fibrillation or Flutter Status ValueSet
codeSystems.description: ValueSet for the status of Atrial Fibrillation or Flutter assessment.

codeSystems.name: AssessmentContextVS
codeSystems.title: Assessment Context ValueSet
codeSystems.description: ValueSet for assessment context codes (e.g., timing of functional scores).

codeSystems.name: BrainImagingModalityVS
codeSystems.title: Brain Imaging Modality ValueSet
codeSystems.description: Defines the SNOMED CT codes for individual brain imaging modalities performed as procedures.

codeSystems.name: CarotidImagingModalityVS
codeSystems.title: Carotid Arteries Imaging Modality ValueSet
codeSystems.description: Defines codes for different types of carotid artery imaging.

codeSystems.name: DischargeDeptVS
codeSystems.title: Discharge Department/Service ValueSet
codeSystems.description: ValueSet specifying the type of department or service the patient was discharged or transferred to.

codeSystems.name: DischargeDestinationValueSet
codeSystems.title: Discharge Destination ValueSet
codeSystems.description: Defines possible patient discharge destinations.

codeSystems.name: DischargeMedicationVS
codeSystems.title: Medications ValueSet
codeSystems.description: Codes for drug products or substances representing the Medications on the patient discharge.

codeSystems.name: FunctionalScoreCodesVS
codeSystems.title: Stroke Functional Score Codes ValueSet
codeSystems.description: Codes for key functional scores used in stroke (mRS, NIHSS).

codeSystems.name: HemorrhagicStrokeBleedingReasonVS
codeSystems.title: Hemorrhagic Stroke Bleeding Reason ValueSet
codeSystems.description: Specifies the identified cause of a hemorrhagic stroke, typically used with an extension.

codeSystems.name: InitialCareIntensityVS
codeSystems.title: Initial Care Intensity ValueSet
codeSystems.description: ValueSet indicating the level of care provided initially.

codeSystems.name: MedicationStatementMedsCodes
codeSystems.title: MedicationStatement Therapy/Finding Codes
codeSystems.description: ValueSet containing SNOMED CT codes representing various medication-related procedures and findings (e.g., therapies, administration procedures, findings about use).

codeSystems.name: MRsScoreVS
codeSystems.title: modified Rankin Scale (mRS) Score ValueSet
codeSystems.description: ValueSet containing the codes for the modified Rankin Scale (mRS) score.

codeSystems.name: MTICICodeVS
codeSystems.title: mTICI Score Codes ValueSet
codeSystems.description: ValueSet containing the codes to represent the mTICI score used to assess the degree of reperfusion after a thrombectomy procedure.

codeSystems.name: MTICIScoreValueSet
codeSystems.title: MTICI Score ValueSet
codeSystems.description: ValueSet containing the codes to represent the MTICI score used to assess the degree of reperfusion after a thrombectomy procedure.

codeSystems.name: PerforationProceduresValueset
codeSystems.title: Perforation Procedures ValueSet
codeSystems.description: ValueSet containing SNOMED CT codes representing a range of perforation procedures.

codeSystems.name: ProcedureTimingContextVS
codeSystems.title: Procedure Timing Context ValueSet
codeSystems.description: ValueSet for codes defining the timing phase of a procedure relative to the encounter start.

codeSystems.name: SpecificFindingCodesVS
codeSystems.title: Specific Stroke Finding Codes ValueSet
codeSystems.description: Codes for specific clinical findings relevant to stroke (Afib/Flutter status, MTICI score).

codeSystems.name: StrokeArrivalModeVS
codeSystems.title: Stroke Arrival Mode ValueSet
codeSystems.description: ValueSet specifying the mode and origin of the patient's arrival.

codeSystems.name: StrokeCircumstanceCodesVS
codeSystems.title: Stroke Circumstance Codes ValueSet
codeSystems.description: Codes for findings related to the circumstances of stroke onset (In-hospital, Wake-up).

codeSystems.name: StrokeDiagnosisVS
codeSystems.title: Stroke Diagnosis ValueSet
codeSystems.description: SNOMED CT concepts representing final stroke-related diagnoses intended for use in Condition.code (and similar elements) within this IG. The scope covers ischemic stroke, intracerebral hemorrhage, subarachnoid hemorrhage, cerebral venous thrombosis, and transient ischemic attack (TIA). This value set is designed to support consistent capture, validation, analytics, and decision support. Implementers should expand against a terminology server using the appropriate SNOMED CT edition/version and preferred language(s) for display. Localizations or national derivatives MAY provide additional designations without altering the canonical definition. This value set is not intended for history-of, screening, or procedural concepts.

codeSystems.name: StrokeDischargeDestinationVS
codeSystems.title: Stroke Discharge Destination ValueSet
codeSystems.description: Defines the possible destinations of the patient upon discharge from the encounter.

codeSystems.name: StrokeEtiologyVS
codeSystems.title: Stroke Etiology ValueSet
codeSystems.description: Specifies the determined etiology of an stroke.

codeSystems.name: StrokeFindingCodesVS
codeSystems.title: Specific Stroke Finding Codes ValueSet
codeSystems.description: ValueSet for specific coded findings like Afib/Flutter status or mTICI score.

codeSystems.name: StrokeProcNotDoneReasonVS
codeSystems.title: Stroke Procedure Not Done Reason ValueSet
codeSystems.description: ValueSet containing specific codes to indicate why thrombolysis or thrombectomy was not performed.

codeSystems.name: StrokeRiskFactorSNOMEDVS
codeSystems.title: Stroke Risk Factor ValueSet
codeSystems.description: Defines the SNOMED CT codes for conditions or risk factors relevant to stroke.

codeSystems.name: StrokeRiskFactorValueSet
codeSystems.title: Stroke Risk Factor ValueSet
codeSystems.description: Defines the SNOMED CT codes for conditions or risk factors relevant to stroke, including an option for unknown status.

codeSystems.name: SwallowProceduresValueset
codeSystems.title: Swallow Procedures ValueSet
codeSystems.description: ValueSet containing SNOMED CT codes representing a range of procedures used in the evaluation and management of stroke patients.

codeSystems.name: SwallowingScreeningTimingCategoryVS
codeSystems.title: Swallowing Screening Timing Category ValueSet
codeSystems.description: Temporal categories relative to stroke onset for swallowing screening.

codeSystems.name: ThrombectomyComplicationVS
codeSystems.title: Thrombectomy Complication ValueSet
codeSystems.description: Defines the specific complications of thrombectomy to record.

codeSystems.name: TimingMetricCodesVS
codeSystems.title: Stroke Timing Metric Codes ValueSet
codeSystems.description: ValueSet for key process timing metrics in acute stroke care (D2N, D2G).

codeSystems.name: VitalSignCodesVS
codeSystems.title: Stroke Vital Sign Codes ValueSet
codeSystems.description: Codes for key vital signs relevant to stroke assessment (Systolic, Diastolic BP).

codeSystems.name: GenderSNOMEDVS
codeSystems.title: Gender (SNOMED CT)
codeSystems.description: Value set to represent patient gender using SNOMED CT codes, analogous to AdministrativeGender.
